subject: Re: DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONAL
body:
DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONAL
PAYMENT AND TRANSFERS.
WIRE TRANSFER / AUDIT UNIT
DIRECTOR: DISCOVERY MANAGEMENT AND PAYMENT BUREAU.

Date: February 8th 2024.

Attn: Mr.Carlos,

Do you know why we asked you to meet with our European Representative and
your Embassy face to face?

Because we don't want an argument or suspicion in this payment. We are sure
of your payment on arrival in Europe as soon as you pay the needed Court
charge for legalization and authentication of your papers (Documents) as
advised by the European Court.

But if you cannot travel to Europe as mentioned above because of some
reasons,then you are advised to send the money to our European
Representative (MR.DAVID JOHNSON) to stand on your behalf.

As soon as you send the money (MR.DAVID JOHNSON),he will then proceed to
the European Court for the needful required before moving to the paying
Bank for immediate release of your payment as previously stated.

Once more,try to comply with our directives this time since your payment is
officially approved to be paid.

In conclusion Sir,you are also advised to reconfirm your detailed
information for easy communication.

Waiting to hear from you soon.

Thanks and God Bless.

Regards.
Thanks
Yours Truly,
Bierman Phillip, head of the Team.

Attn: Carlos,

Mr.Carlos,you can now understand everything going on with us.

Now you are advised to come to Europe to have a meeting with our Pay

But if you cannot come,what you need is to send the money for validation of
your Documents by the Court before your payment by the Bank.

But if you don't want to receive your payment,let us know as soon as
possible.

Regards.

Bierman Phillip, head of the Team.

subject: Re: DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONAL
body:
DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONAL
PAYMENT AND TRANSFERS.
WIRE TRANSFER / AUDIT UNIT
DIRECTOR: DISCOVERY MANAGEMENT AND PAYMENT BUREAU.

Date: February 14th 2024.

Attn: Mr.Carlos,

Sir,we can't order cancellation of your payment even by the European Union
without hearing from you.

We want to know your intent before further actions. Meanwhile can you tell
us your final decision as detailed before?

Really we have consulted your Embassy here after our discussion with the
Court and we are still waiting for your compliance.

Frankly speaking,we don't want to return your payment as unclaimed funds,
even cancellation,but your attitude over this payment is unacceptable,
especially now your Embassy is fully involved. Are you afraid or scared of
your payment?

Take note of this,we don't want to return your payment to Country of origin
because of so many fraudsters but your delay can lead to that. If you want
to receive your payment now,come forward or send any of your
Representatives with the needed Court fee for the completion of this
transaction.

Read our message above and get back to us immediately with your answer.

Regards.
Thanks
Yours Truly,
Bierman Phillip, head of the Team.

subject: Re: DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONAL
body:
DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONAL
PAYMENT AND TRANSFERS.
WIRE TRANSFER / AUDIT UNIT
DIRECTOR: DISCOVERY MANAGEMENT AND PAYMENT BUREAU.

Date: February 21st 2024.

Attn: Carlos,

Sir,what are you trying to do?

Are you trying to forfeit your payment simply because of the needed Court
charge for legalization and authentication of your papers as advised by the
European Court?

Sir,we can't understand you at all. Please if you don't want to receive
your overdue funds totaled the sum of (USD65.5M) with accrued
interest,kindly inform us after reading this message for cancellation,but
if really you wish to receive it,you are urgently advised to travel to
Europe with the needed Court charge and witness the release of your payment
into your Bank Account before returning to your Country.

But if you cannot travel to Europe because of the distance or other
reasons,you are advised to send the money to our European Representative
(MR.DAVID JOHNSON) to stand on your behalf and do the needful before
proceeding to the paying Bank for your payment.

Mr.Carlos,now your Embassy is involved in your case,what else are you
looking for?

Please we are no more comfortable with your delay and will proceed to your
Embassy any moment from now for cancellation of your payment.

Either you comply with our directives or give us power of attorney to
change your name and proceed immediately for cancellation of your payment.

Waiting to hear from you ASAP.

Regards.
Thanks
Yours Truly,
Bierman Phillip, head of the Team.

subject: DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONA
body:
DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONAL
PAYMENT AND TRANSFERS.
WIRE TRANSFER / AUDIT UNIT
DIRECTOR: DISCOVERY MANAGEMENT AND PAYMENT BUREAU.
Date: February 28 2024.
Attn:  
My good Friend,listen properly,all the Embassies in Europe have been notified about unpaid funds due to a series of reports from Government Agencies and they are ready waiting for the European Court to come with the necessary Documents related to the payments.
But without legalization and authentication of the Documents,they cannot support or grant such payments to be released until the Documents are validated by the Court for genuine payments.
Sir,we are still interested in your case and also ready to move on based on our agreement with the European Union and United Nation,but to avoid suspicion or doubt in your claim,the Court will first of all legalize and authenticate your Documents to prove the reality and genuine source of your claim.
As a matter of fact,we have concluded all the arrangements with the European Court and all the European Embassies,but without all the papers being validated by the Court,going to the Embassy doesn't make any sense and may lead to seizure or cancellation of your payment.
Now if you wish to claim your funds genuinely and without any hitch,you are first of all advised to pay for legalization and authentication of your papers to our European Representative (MR.DAVID JOHNSON) on arrival in Europe to proceed immediately for validation of your papers which is the first and the most important thing in your case.
Since you reside in your Country as you said,read this email and reconfirm your detailed information to us and also try to consider the above.
We are sure of your payment as soon as you pay the needed Court charge to our European Representative (MR.DAVID JOHNSON).
In conclusion, once again,as soon as your papers are legalized and authenticated by the European Court, we can then present them to your Embassy in Europe,not before.
Regards.
Thanks
Yours Truly,
Bierman Phillip, head of the Team.

subject: Re:    DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONA

Also, could you provide more information about Mr. Johnson's role in Europe? How will he assist me in this process?

I appreciate your assistance and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Jonathan

subject: Re: DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONA
body:
DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONAL
PAYMENT AND TRANSFERS.
WIRE TRANSFER / AUDIT UNIT
DIRECTOR: DISCOVERY MANAGEMENT AND PAYMENT BUREAU.

Date: March 1st 2024.

Attn: Jonathan,

Try to understand our agreement with the European Embassies concerning
outstanding payments because of fraudulent activities going on around the
World.

Series of reports from Government Agencies about fraud and to identify the
real source of your payment,We have written an agreement with all the
European Embassies that must be followed.

Sir,if you are not the real owner of the said funds,I wouldn't have
contacted you earlier,but because your name Mr.Jonathan was found as one of
the victims,that was why I contacted you as directed by the United Nation
and the European Union.

Again,all the names of the victims found during our research have been
forwarded to our European pay officer/Representative (MR.DAVID JOHNSON) ,
even their email addresses,but without Court approval and recommendation to
the European Embassies,their payments will not be released.

All the victims affected are advised to pay for legalization and
authentication of their papers because of fraudulent activities and to
prove the real source of their claims.

Without Court approval and Recommendation to the European Embassies,their
claims are illegal.

Mr.Jonathan,all the Documents related to your payment have been forwarded
to the European Court for legalization and authentication as agreed with
the European Embassies.

And to proceed in your payment without further delay, You are required to
pay the sum of 28,000 Euros Court charge for both legalization and
authentication of your papers that will be presented to the European
Embassies by our European pay officer/Representative (MR.DAVID JOHNSON) for
confirmation before proceeding to the paying Bank for your payment.

As earlier informed,the money shall be given to our European pay
officer/Representative (MR.DAVID JOHNSON) on arrival in Europe to do the
needful on your behalf before proceeding to the paying Bank.

Mr.Jonathan,if you want to receive your payment truly,now or never as we
have concluded all the arrangements with the European Court and the
Embassies.

The most important thing is your quick compliance to proceed as soon as
possible.

Before returning back to your Country,your payment is sure into your Bank
account.

In conclusion once again,try to reconfirm all your detailed information
below as advised by the above authorities,both Court and Embassies to avoid
mistakes. Be rest assured.

YOUR FULL NAMES
YOUR FULL HOUSE ADDRESS
YOUR OCCUPATION
YOUR COMPANY NAME
YOUR INTERNATIONAL PASSPORT
YOUR MOBILE AND WHATS APP NUMBERS
YOUR NEXT OF KIN
YOUR AGE

Regards.
Thanks
Yours Truly,
Bierman Phillip, head of the Team.

subject: Re: DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONA
body:
DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONAL
PAYMENT AND TRANSFERS.
WIRE TRANSFER / AUDIT UNIT
DIRECTOR: DISCOVERY MANAGEMENT AND PAYMENT BUREAU.

Date: March 2nd 2024.

Attn: Jonathan,

We have carefully gone through your emails to us,but before further
proceedings,let us make it quite clear to you once more to avoid confusion.

(1) Our European pay officer/Representative (MR.DAVID JOHNSON) is the
person nominated by the authorities to carry out all foreign payments in
Europe.

(2) MR.DAVID JOHNSON is the only authorized pay officer to handle all the
European approved payments, both Contract Inheritance and Lottery Winning
Awards.

Meanwhile before moving to the paying Bank for the release of your total
funds worth (USD65.5M),you are required to pay the sum of 28,000 Euros
Court charge for legalization and authentication of your papers as advised
by the European Embassies as previously stated.

The above fee will be given to our European pay officer/Representative
(MR.DAVID JOHNSON) on arrival in Europe that will be paid to the Court for
validation of your papers as agreed with the United Nation European Union
and all the European Embassies to avoid money laundering drugs or
terrorist.

My good Friend,payment of this kind requires Court approval and
recommendation to the paying Bank for genuineness and real source of your
claim.

Can you now understand our explanation and why you are advised to pay the
required Court charge?

In conclusion Sir,try to forward your detailed information and also let us
know the date of trip to Europe for the completion of this transaction with
MR.DAVID JOHNSON.

Sincerely speaking,we have concluded all the arrangements with the European
Court and all the European Embassies and we are still waiting for your
quick compliance to move on.

Delay is DANGEROUS to avoid SEIZURE or CANCELLATION of your approved
payment.

Very urgent Sir.

Thanks once again.

Regards.
Thanks
Yours Truly,
Bierman Phillip, head of the Team.

You mentioned a certain amount in Euros that needs to be paid for court charges. Could you please clarify how much exactly this is? Also, could you explain why this fee is necessary?

Furthermore, you mentioned a trip to Europe. Is it absolutely necessary for me to travel there? I'm not very comfortable with traveling at the moment due to personal reasons.

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Jonathan

Date: March 1st 2024.

Attn: Jonathan,

Sir,please if you don't want to receive your approved payment,let us know
after reading this email.

Again,the sum of Sixty Five Million Five Hundred Thousand United States
Dollars (USD65.5M) is approved in your name through our European pay
officer (MR.DAVID JOHNSON).

But before the release of the money above,you are required to pay a Court
charge for legalization and authentication of your Documents as advised by
the European Court and all the European Embassies.

Mr.Jonathan,if you wish to receive your payment as stated above,try to
arrange the required Court charge which is Twenty Eight Thousand Euros as
earlier stated.

Thanks once again.

Regards.
Thanks
Yours Truly,
Bierman Phillip, head of the Team.

subject: Re: DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONA
body:
Hello Bierman Phillip,

Thank you for your email. It's quite exciting to hear about the approved sum of Sixty Five Million Five Hundred Thousand United States Dollars in my name. I must say, it's a bit overwhelming.

I'm curious about the process though. Could you please explain more about this Court charge? Why is it necessary and what does it cover exactly?

Also, could you tell me more about JOHNSON, our European pay officer? How will he be assisting us in this process?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Jonathan
